The only monsters to drop black darts are Burthorpe soldiers. This makes black darts rather rare and hard to obtain. Black darts can be poisoned and they can be wielded with a shield.

The black dart is a thrown weapon that requires 10 Ranged to wield. Black darts cannot be made with the Fletching skill and instead are obtained through monster drops. The only monsters to drop black darts are Burthorpe soldiers. This makes black darts rather rare and hard to obtain. Black darts can be poisoned and they can be wielded with a shield.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
30 June 2021
(update)

The black dart's Ranged Attack bonus has been decreased from +7 to 0.

4 â€“ 11 June 2007

The unpoisoned variant's value was decreased from 18 to 1.

22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Black dart(+)" to "Black dart(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Black dart(s)" to "Black dart(p++)".

The '''black dart''' is a thrown weapon that requires 10 [[Ranged]] to wield. Black darts '''cannot''' be made with the [[Fletching]] skill and instead are obtained through monster drops. The only monsters to drop black darts are [[Soldier (Burthorpe)|Burthorpe soldier]]s. This makes black darts rather rare and hard to obtain. Black darts can be [[poison]]ed and they can be wielded with a shield.
